content: this colorful knit hat is a great way to welcome colder weather in style stitched in caron colorama o go pattern is offered in 2 colorways so you can knit with color changes as you go or make it with a planned striped design project is worked in rounds for a seamless look as you practice the slip_stitch with yarn in back technique a playful pom pom is created with leftovers of all colors one ball yields 2 hats so it s a great value project materials size u s 10½ 6 5 mm circular knitting needle 16 40 5 cm long set of 4 size u s 10½ 6 5 mm double-pointed knitting needles
